name: Missman
description:
A game designed for players seeking adrenaline and challenges.
Missman is a 2D platformer that tests your limits and patience.
You embody a secret agent assassin, armed with a unique pistol.

Your objective? To eliminate a high-placed target at the end of an obstacle-laden course.

  • Unique Propulsion: Use your pistol to create impact zones and propel yourself through levels.
  • Continuous Challenges: Expect to lose progress and start over, testing your resilience and ability to overcome frustration.
  • Diverse Environments: Traverse various urban settings, each with its own unique obstacles and traps.
  • Immersive Gameplay: A mix of strategy, skill, and patience.
  • One Level, Multiple Challenges: A continuous journey that takes you ever higher, demanding perfect mastery of the game mechanics.

Missman is not just a game, it's a test of perseverance.

Are you ready to take on the challenge?
